createLightOnMessage

Parameters:

createLightIntesityMessage

public static Message createLightIntesityMessage(Context room,
                                                 int intensityInPerCent)
This method should be used to create a message to switch the main light of a room on and set it to the given intensity If intensityInPerCent less equals 0, the light be will switch off. If intensityInPerCent greater equals 100, the light will be switch on with full intensity of 100%.

Parameters:
room -
intensityInPerCent - Value between 0 and 100
Returns:

public static Message createLightOffMessage(Context room)
This method should be used to create a message to switch the main light of a room off

Parameters:

Returns:
